app.name: Button Game
app.short_description: A pretty simple Clicker Game, for the Wii (as well as Wii Mini and vWii)!
app.long_description:
Button Game A very simple Clicker Game, for the Wii! (also works on Wii Mini and vWii)
Pretty much a remake of my first wii game by the same name.
Press A to Select/Click, Up and Down on the D-Pad to Navigate Menus, and Left/Right on the D-Pad to Change Pages.
Thank you Cooper for testing and helping!
